CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISNULL(pse__Days_Worked_Override__c)), pse__Days_Worked_Override__c, IF( NOT(ISNULL(pse__Total_Days_Worked_Advanced__c)), pse__Total_Days_Worked_Advanced__c, IF((pse__Sunday_Hours__c>0),1,0) + IF((pse__Monday_Hours__c>0),1,0) + IF((pse__Tuesday_Hours__c>0),1,0) + IF((pse__Wednesday_Hours__c>0),1,0) + IF((pse__Thursday_Hours__c>0),1,0) + IF((pse__Friday_Hours__c>0),1,0) + IF((pse__Saturday_Hours__c>0),1,0) ) )
CustomField.label: Total Days Worked
